value: Write a function that takes 2 strings as parameters and prints whose length is bigger, if both lengths are equal print two strings.

title: solution
value:
function is_equal_lenth(str1,str2){
if(str1.length === str2.length){
console.log(str1);
console.log(str2);
}
else if(str1.length > str2.length){
console.log(str1);
}
else{
console.log(str2);
}
}

is_equal_lenth("hello","welcome");
